name: Midwest Energy Emissions Corp.
description: Midwest Energy Emissions Corp. (ME2C) is a leading provider of advanced emissions control solutions, primarily focusing on reducing mercury and other harmful pollutants from industrial processes. Founded in 2013, the company is headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas. ME2C leverages innovative technologies to deliver effective and sustainable solutions for the power generation sector and other industries that face stringent emissions regulations. The company’s flagship product, a patented mercury emissions control technology, is designed to be both cost-effective and environmentally friendly. By utilizing proprietary sorbent materials, ME2C helps its clients achieve compliance with environmental standards while minimizing operational costs. Midwest Energy Emissions Corp. is committed to driving progress in sustainable energy practices and contributing to a cleaner environment through its partnerships with power plants and industrial facilities across the United States. The company continues to invest in research and development to expand its portfolio of emission reduction technologies, aligning with the global transition towards smarter and greener energy solutions. With a strong emphasis on customer service, engineering expertise, and environmental responsibility, ME2C is positioned as a trusted partner in the energy sector.
